#summary hbox widget reference

= hbox widget =
A [http://developer.gnome.org/gtk/2.24/GtkHBox.html GtkHBox] optionally packed inside a [http://developer.gnome.org/gtk/2.24/GtkScrolledWindow.html GtkScrolledWindow]
----

== Definition ==
{{{
<hbox tag_attr="value"...>
	widget...
</hbox>
}}}
"..." denotes acceptance of multiples of the same thing.

== Tag Attributes ==
See the [http://developer.gnome.org/gtk/2.24/GtkHBox.html#GtkHBox.object-hierarchy GtkHBox] widget and ancestor class properties.

The following custom tag attributes are available:
|| *Name* || *Description* || *Value* || *Since* ||
|| margin || Surrounding space || Positive integer || 0.7.21 ||
|| scrollable || Scrolled window capability || {{{true}}} or {{{false}}} || 0.7.21 ||
|| height || Scrolled window dimension || Positive integer || 0.7.21 ||
|| width || Scrolled window dimension || Positive integer || 0.7.21 ||

== Directives ==
None.

== Signals ==
None.

== Functions ==
None.

== Notes ==
None.
